body.name: Gulicola PP Baby Bottles Set for Breastfed Newborn Babies, Soft & Extra Slow Flow Nipples (SS), 0 Months +, BPA Free, 7 oz & 2 Pack - Pink

features: Include: 2 pack of 7 oz bottle with Extra slow flow nipple (0 m+); different size nipples come with different specific hole size shape, thickness and softness for babies of every age;
Safety Material: It’s made of Polypropylene (PP) with heat resistance and excellent durability. BPA and BPS free;
New Design Nipple: points on the nipple guiding for appropriate latch, train babies with correct suction habits in breastfeeding;

Great for Nursing Moms: Ultra-soft nipple mimics natural feel, flex and movement of breastfeeding, helps breastfed baby naturally latch on, anti-colic vents allow your baby to drink continuously without gasping for air or drinking bubbles;
Easy to Clean: only have 4 pieces and can easily be cleaned and reassembled as often as needed, sterilized in bottle warmer, microwave, sterilizer and boiling water.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Only bottle my baby will use!
reviews.reviewText: This is the only bottle my baby will use and the vent actually works. The parts are easy to replace and has both plastic and glass options. Definitely worth it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for breastfeeding babies
reviews.reviewText: I breastfeed my daughter 90% of the time, but in the occasion when I need to leave her home and she needs to be given pumped milk, or when we are in the car, these bottles are my go to! The slope of the nipple is such an easy adjustment and transition for her because of the natural shape. I brought these along with two other mainstream brands of bottles with me to a lactation appointment and the specialist was very surprised and please when I showed her these bottles. She said the size and length of the nipple is great and encouraged me to continue using them! I do wish there was a single bottle option to purchase though.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Well-designed and durable
reviews.reviewText: I purchased the Gulicola PP Baby Bottles for my friend and her newborn baby, who will be staying with me for a while. These bottles have proven to be well-designed and durable. My friend has expressed her satisfaction with their performance and how easy they are to clean. I'm glad to have made a reliable choice for the baby's feeding needs during their stay.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good baby bottles
reviews.reviewText: I bought these for my neighbour's baby and the baby liked them a lot. They were easy to clean and use and were sturdy enough to not break after falling off the table.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Quality breastfeeding-friendly bottles.
reviews.reviewText: My 6-month-old is solely breastfed but I am wanting to start giving him bottles of pumped milk every now and then to get him used to taking bottles so I can leave him for short periods of time here and there. I have ordered a few different types of bottles to see what he likes. He hasn't "picked" his favorite yet and still seems to just be getting used to the idea of taking milk from something that isn't directly his mama, but I personally think these have one of the better designs I have seen. I suspect that once he gets the hang of it he will really like these. The shape of the nipple is very natural, and it is comfortable for me to hold while feeding him. They are easy to clean and seem to be well constructed. The price is a little high, but I think they are comparable to other quality breastfeeding-friendly bottles. If you are shopping around to find what your breastfed baby will like, I think these could be a good option.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: My grandchildren are breastfed but it’s nice to have milk stored for an occasional feeding. These high quality plastic bottles have soft flexible nipples and do the job well of simulating breastfeeding.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Holds a lot free of leaks
reviews.reviewText: I’ve been happy with how well these has been working for my little one. High quality bottles that are easy to clean. I would recommend these to others!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for my newborn
reviews.reviewText: I'm due at the end of October and needed to stock up on bottles. I love that these are slow flow, and the anti colic holes are a great design which makes these easier to clean vs the other styles. The cap is another feature I like for travel and helping to prevent leaks.
